trustyai.init

trustyai.init(*args, path=JAVA_DEPENDENCIES)

Initialize the Java bindings. We recommend calling this directly after importing trustyai, to avoid import errors:

import trustyai
trustyai.init()
Parameters
args: list

List of args to be passed to jpype.startJVM. See the JPype manual for more details.

path: list[str]

List of jar files to add the Java class path. By default, this will add the necessary dependencies of the TrustyAI Java library.
